name: Barney Adventures
description: The adventures of Barney is here! Following Grizzly Adventure engine, this is an exciting new side-scrolling platform game by Jadeware with paralax and many items just like Aladdin game on SuperNES or Megadrive and with many weapons and player upgrades, jump defense and attack also upgradable. Earn XP points, upgrade your player and guns (upgradable)
